decision_reasoning: officer obtained conflicting medical evidence without providing it to the applicants' counsel
failing to analyze the health issues properly
cause_of_action: Applicants sought a deferral of removal due to health issues and an ongoing H&C application
procedure_followed: Judicial review analyzed the officer's decision using the reasonableness standard and found flaws in the decision-making process
result_of_case: The officer's decision was set aside
the case was remanded for re-determination post-H&C resolution
